body_html:
Hi @samikama ,

Thanks for your replay.

I'm actually trying to speed-up the inference, so nothing to do with training for now. My idea is to use the TF 1.7 with TRT GraphDef optimization API to optimize a trained model, and then use the TF to do the prediction on the optimized GraphDef. The TRT UFF model conversion or TRT inference engine are not used.

I've successfully done this procedure on the frozen model (#18548). But since the online serving is using the saved_model, I tried to load a saved_model and extract its graph_def, and use TRT to optimize it. But Error occurs here.

Thanks,

body:
Hi @samikama ,

Thanks for your replay.

I'm actually trying to speed-up the inference, so nothing to do with training for now. My idea is to use the TF 1.7 with TRT GraphDef optimization API to optimize a trained model, and then use the TF to do the prediction on the optimized GraphDef. The TRT UFF model conversion or TRT inference engine are not used.

I've successfully done this procedure on the frozen model (#18548). But since the online serving is using the saved_model, I tried to load a saved_model and extract its graph_def, and use TRT to optimize it. But Error occurs here.

Thanks,
